contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Libramont-Chevigny |picture=Libramont-Chevigny JPG01.jpg |picture-legend=The new church in Libramont |map=Libramont-Chevigny Luxembourg Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Libramont-Chevigny in Luxembourg province |arms= |flag= |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LX}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Neufchâteau (Belgium)|Neufchâteau]] |nis=84077 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Pierre Arnould |majority=Chevi 2006 |postal-codes=6800 |telephone-area=061 |web=[http://www.libramontchevigny.be libramont-chevigny.be] |lat_deg=49 |lat_min=55 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=23 }} '''Libramont-Chevigny''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] of [[Belgium]] located in the [[Luxembourg (province of Belgium)|province of Luxembourg]]. On 1 January 2007 the municipality, which covers 177.86 km², had 9,981 inhabitants, giving a [[population density]] of 56.1 inhabitants per km². ==Notable inhabitants== *[[Marie Howet]], [[expressionism|expressionist]] [[painting|painter]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{Official website|http://www.libramontchevigny.be}} (in French) {{commonscat}} {{Municipalities in Luxembourg}} [[Category:Populated places in Belgium]] [[Category:Municipalities of Luxembourg (Belgium)]] {{LuxembourgBE-geo-stub}}
